SEARCH
Package VV.Tiles

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
VV.Tiles.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
BedTile, DoorTile, FloorTile, RockTile, WallTile, WaterTile
public class Tile extends Object
The Tile class defines different types of tiles with their respective images and properties for a game.
